title: Business Innovation and Growth
description: This course is a gentle and technology-friendly introduction to business innovation, growth, and entrepreneurship. The course introduces students to the economic fundamentals that lead to business scalability and sustainability. Topics of operations, supply, product, and project management are also introduced. Students gain understanding of the design and innovation approaches in business and entrepreneurship with exercises and a digital simulation. Credit not allowed for MGT 128R and MGT 128. Prerequisites: upper-division standing.
